channel.title: *| NewRealm | Legend+Ironman mode | Refund Donor | Boss Pets | + more! |*
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/t0nxv53rt/logo.png[/img]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=3]WebsitE[/SIZE][/FONT] [url=http://newrealmrs.net]NewRealmRS[/url] [FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=3]Client[/SIZE][/FONT] [url=http://newrealmrs.net/downloads/NewRealm.jar]NewRealmRS[/url]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=3]24/7 VPS Hosted Fresh new Server Developing to the players decision Legend & (Now True) Ironman Game Mode Client Sounds HD Textures (Optional) Fully working Chaos Tunnels Warriors Guild Pest Control Duel Arena Duo Slayer Barrows Boss Pets Fight Cave Fight Pit Grave Arena Realistic Skilling Random Events! + More!
[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=2]I am currently willing to replace any donation status from other servers you may have quit in the past, all I need is proof of purchase which includes everything within the package.
Updates everyday! Would love all players to suggest changes and customisations for us to implement into the server. We are hoping to slowly create a community in which we can grow solid and enjoy this experience. I am currently looking for suitable mature staff: 1 x Graphics Designer [/SIZE] [IMG]http://s16.postimg.org/ble2b1qqd/newrealmhome.png[/img] [IMG]http://s11.postimg.org/6wfx0nh9f/bosses.png[/img] [IMG]http://s11.postimg.org/syrdvedgj/ironman.png[/img] [IMG]http://s29.postimg.org/ceeog41lj/xmas.png[/img][/CENTER]
To be Expanded
Original (before changes) credit to Swiffy

item.dc:creator: @ekekek12 ekekek12
item.description:
@ekekek12 wrote:

Flumby although you are very new I think this server is good, it isn’t a complete rip atleast and you have fixed several bugs including special attacks etc.

Good job and I hope more players see the actual work you do on here everyday!

Read full topic

item.title: *| NewRealm | Legend+Ironman mode | Refund Donor | Boss Pets | + more! |*
item.dc:creator: @flumby flumby
item.description:
@flumby wrote:

KeeganJ:

I’ve been playing the server for a week. My new addiction. Xp rates are perfect, the economy isn’t ruined like most servers, and an ironman mode. Seriously, if you’re looking for a new server to join, give New Realm a try.

Thanks Keegan

Read full topic
